page.title: 15No Leisure Centre
page.content: Brechin chances of getting a Leisure Centre are zero at present, Mr William Robertson, chairman of the Community Council, told last night's Meeting. Members studied a letter from Mr Kenneth Dron Rector of the High School, on behalf of the School Council, suggesting that if there could not be purpose built Centre the School' P.E. block could be converted into a self contained Community Block, of which the school would have generous use during term time. One of the facilities which should be provided the Community Council felt is a swimming pool.The High School pool, it was suggested, is not only used to capacity, but is too small.
